DeepMatter.rand_util package¶

Submodules¶

DeepMatter.rand_util.rand_gen module¶

rand_util.rand_gen.rand_tensor(min=0, max=1, size=1)[source]¶

Function that generates random tensor between a range of an arbitary size

Parameters

  • min (float) – sets the minimum value of parameter

  • max (float) – sets the maximum value of parameter

  • size (tuple) – sets the size of the random vector to generate

Returns

random tensor generated

Return type

tensor

rand_util.rand_gen.set_seeds(seed=42)[source]¶
Parameters

seed (int) – random value to set the sequence of the shuffle and random normalization
